task_requirements:
Implement test reporters that map results back to Journey definitions.

**Tasks (T091-T100):**
- T091: Create reporter types in core/typescript/reporters/types.ts
- T092: Implement mapTestToJourney and groupTestsByJourney in core/typescript/reporters/journey-reporter.ts
- T093: Implement calculateJourneyStatus in core/typescript/reporters/journey-reporter.ts
- T094: Implement ARTKReporter class in core/typescript/reporters/artk-reporter.ts
- T095: Implement saveScreenshot with PII masking option in core/typescript/reporters/artifacts.ts
- T096: Implement maskPiiInScreenshot function in core/typescript/reporters/masking.ts
- T097: Implement generateARTKReport and writeARTKReport in core/typescript/reporters/artk-reporter.ts
- T098: Create reporters module barrel export in core/typescript/reporters/index.ts
- T099: Write unit tests for journey mapping in core/typescript/reporters/__tests__/journey-reporter.test.ts
- T100: Write unit tests for PII masking in core/typescript/reporters/__tests__/masking.test.ts

**Checkpoint**: Reporters complete - can generate ARTK reports with journey mapping and PII masking

**Dependencies**: US1 (Config) is complete. Reference existing modules:
- core/typescript/config/ (ARTKConfig types)
- core/typescript/types/common.ts (base types)
